page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Today we went to the beach at Cruden Bay,I asked my mum and dad if Heather Burnett could stay with us. "Yes",said mum.The weather was lovely and hot.My mum's friends and their children,Sharon and Wayne came too.The journey was hard going.We saw a lot of lovely flowers in the gardens.When we got there we took all the gear out of the bus to the beach. The water was cold and shallow.The sand was lovely and soft on the beach.I decided to walk over the bridge to see the clear shallow water underneath. It was beautiful. I played in the sand for a long time.Then I went out to swim with my sisters.The water was very salty in the sea.I saw dogs playing in it.They were jumping all over the place.I would like to go again.
